title: Philippines: Discounts on Top-Notch Medical Care with Mercury Drug Citibank Card
summary: Philippines - Citibank, in partnership with the country's top hospitals. has introduced new benefits that come with the Mercury Drug Citibank Card. Cardholders not only enjoy up to a 10 percent rebate, but also receive up to a 10 percent discount on various services at Asian Hospital, Makati Medical Center, St. Luke's Medical Center and The Medical City.
tag-1: Philippines: Discounts on Top-Notch Medical Care with Mercury Drug Citibank Card
tag-2: Philippines – Citibank, in partnership with the country's top hospitals. has introduced new benefits that come with the Mercury Drug Citibank Card. Cardholders not only enjoy up to a 10 percent rebate, but also receive up to a 10 percent discount on various services at Asian Hospital, Makati Medical Center, St. Luke's Medical Center and The Medical City.
tag-3: As these four leading hospitals have an aggregate market share of 60 percent, Mercury Drug Citibank Card users will be able to get the most out of their credit card, should the need arise. The discounts include hospital bills, inpatient pharmacy purchases and laboratory services, among others.
tag-4: "We continue to improve our offerings for our cardholders as we hope to give them the best health benefits from the most renowned partners in the medical and wellness industry. The Mercury Drug Citibank Card has all the relevant features customers can hope to see in a credit card especially made for healthcare," said Bea Tan, Credit Payment Products Director of Citibank in the Philippines.
tag-5: On top of the discounts, the Mercury Drug Citibank Card provides a free annual physical check-up package at Healthway Medical. It also comes with waived joining fee and 15 percent off at Fitness First.
tag-6: Customers earn up to 10 percent rebate on purchases at Mercury Drug and partner hospitals when they charge at least 10,000 pesos a month to their Mercury Drug Citibank Card for various purchases, including groceries, shopping, gas and many more. Every 250 pesos worth of rebates earned is automatically credited to the customer's next purchase at any Mercury Drug outlet nationwide, the largest drugstore retailer in the Philippines with an 83 percent market share.
